content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-10.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-10.0, -50.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -48.5) for transferring items into the stone furnace.
- Wooden Chest at position (-8.5, -49.5) for storing iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (-7.5, -49.5) for transferring items from the wooden chest.

### Conveyor Belt System
Consists of several BeltGroups:
- BeltGroup with inputs from (x=-15.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-54.5) and outputs from (x=-12.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-10.5, y=-54.5).
- BeltGroup with inputs from (x=-21.5, y=-51.5) to (x=-19.5, y=-51.5) and outputs from (x=-15.5, y=-51.5) to (x=-15.5, y=-53.5).
- BeltGroup with inputs from (x=-14.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-50.5) and outputs from (x=-16.5, y=-55.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-55.5).
- BeltGroup with inputs from (x=-9.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-52.5) and outputs from (x=-9.5, y=-53.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-55.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Iron Plate Production Issues
- Ensure that the stone furnace has both fuel and ingredients to smelt. The furnace is currently out of fuel and lacks ingredients, leading to low production.

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure that the target entity, such as a wooden chest, contains the items you intend to extract. The error occurred when attempting to extract iron ore from a chest that did not contain it.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Make sure that the inserters have access to source items. The inserters are currently waiting for source items, which may indicate a supply chain issue.
